titles: A confutation of a sermon, pronou[n]ced by M. Iuell, at Paules crosse, the second Sondaie before Easter (which Catholikes doe call Passion Sondaie) Anno D[omi]ni .M.D.LX. By Iohn Rastell M. of Art, and studient in diuinitie
author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.
notes: A reply to the sermon printed as part 2 of: Jewel, John. The true copies of the letters betwene the reverend father in God John Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole.
Answered by STC 11433: Fulke, William.  "D. Heskins, D. Sanders and M. Rastel overthrowne", published in 1579.
Running title reads: A confutation of M. Iuelles sermon.
Print faded and show-through; text on F1r does not follow that of E8v.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio.
keywords: Jewel, John, 1522-1571. --  True copies of the letters betwene the reverend father in God John Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole --  Controversial literature.
